ClickView Repo is a Python library that makes creating command-line interfaces (CLIs) easy and fun. It uses simple Python decorators (@click.command, @click.option, etc.) to turn your functions into CLI commands with options and arguments. Click handles parsing user input, generating help messages, validating data types, and managing the flow between commands, letting you focus on your applicationâ€™s logic. It also provides tools for terminal interactions like prompting users and showing progress bars.
